title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
content: Auction of coolstorage.org Litecoin/Ethereum car set - #7 & signed by zipreg They will come in frames and will include all original itemsTHIS IS ONE LOT STARTING BID 0.001 BTC MINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001 BTC END TIME: Tuesday, June 20th, 15:00 (3:00 pm) ESTWhen placing your bid, please post your username followed by bid amountExample:MoparMiningLLC - .001 BTC**Payment due within 48 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.Basically, auction ends at the appointed time - unless extended - if extended the auction ends once 5 minutes elapse with no bids.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC and only to this address: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4es - if you get a pm to pay any other way - ignore it, it will not be from me.Shipping can be done directly by me or item can be provided to minerjones for consolidation with other orders and reshipping. There is no fee for me to provide them to minerjones.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Wow - can’t remember seeing these out in the wild before?? 0.0011BTCPlease
